item.title: PlayStation State of Play heads to Japan tomorrow night
item.content:encoded:
Sony has announced the next State of Play stream, with State of Play Japan putting a special focus on games coming out of the company’s homeland and Asia as a whole.

State of Play Japan airs on PlayStation’s various YouTube channels on 11th November at 2pm PT /  5pm ET / 10pm GMT / 11pm CET | 12th November at 7am JST.

The stream will run for over 40 minutes, and focus on titles coming from Japan and Asia, though there’s space for a few other updates as well on more hotly anticipated PS5 games.

Hosted by voice actor Yuki Kaji – who plays Eren Yeager in Attack on Titan – it will feature Japanese audio with English and other regional subtitles.

Source: PS Blog



https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2025/11/10/playstation-state-of-play-heads-to-japan-tomorrow-night/
